entry.title: BIP 20 Rejected, process for BIP 21N
entry.summary: In a discussion thread, Matt Corallo has changed "mustimplement" to "req" for brevity and explicitly stated that numbers should not contain commas and should use periods to separate whole numbers and decimal fractions. However, he also mentioned that depending on variable names to provide information is not ideal and asked for suggestions on how to ensure backward compatibility. Wladimir suggested using an abbreviated prefix instead of "mustimplement" to keep URL sizes small for QR codes and such.
